backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining types and in‑memory maps for videos, chunks, comments, interactions, users, and providing interaction summary logic with mixins for storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a UI change to the NotificationsDropdown component and listing related packages, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file, including components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme design tokens and base styles for the app.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the React app with PWA and meta tags configured.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, cache cleanup, and offline strategies excluding large media and IC API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry configuring routing, React Query client, theme provider, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/account/ProfileM: Renders a user profile dropdown menu with avatar, navigation links, theme toggle, and sign-in/out handling based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/account/ThemeTog: Provides dropdown items to switch between light, dark, and system themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar listing primary routes with icons and active state detection.
frontend/src/components/ChannelHeader.ts: Renders a channel header with avatar, stats, and follow button, with skeleton loading state.
frontend/src/components/CommentSection.t: Displays comments for a video and provides authenticated users a form to post new comments, with loading placeholders.
frontend/src/components/FollowButton.tsx: A follow/unfollow toggle button with simulated async handling and login enforcement.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo, search, notifications, and profile menu, supporting mobile and desktop layouts.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout combining header, sidebar, main content outlet, bottom nav, and PWA prompt.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Displays a notifications dropdown showing unread counts, lists notifications with icons, and supports marking items as read.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileE: Dialog form for editing user profile fields including basic info, bio, images, and social links, with save handling.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Shows a conditional install prompt for the PWA, handling iOS and browser-specific install flows.
frontend/src/components/settings/MoodAIS: Settings section allowing authenticated users to enable Mood AI and select their current mood, with loading and update states.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Left sidebar navigation listing core app routes with active state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Displays a video thumbnail, metadata, and channel info with links to video and channel pages.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: Streams video chunks via an actor, manages loading and errors, and supports offline and placeholder states.
frontend/src/components/watch/useWatchSh: Hook that enables sharing a video via Web Share API or clipboard fallback with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/watch/WatchActio: Action bar for video pages providing like/dislike, comment, share, save, and download actions with count formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoUpload: Handles chunked video uploads with progress, cancellation, retry, and metadata upload using an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context including login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodSignals.ts: Tracks watch, like, and activity signals in localStorage and infers a user mood from engagement patterns.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Loads, stores, seeds, and updates user notifications per-identity with unread tracking and read operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating video metadata, interactions, and lists via an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useShortUpload.ts: Uploads short videos as a single blob with progress tracking and returns a direct URL.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind-based theme variables, dark mode styles, utilities, and scrollbar/mobile navigation tweaks.
frontend/src/lib/followCopy.ts: Contains static UI copy for follow-related labels and text.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging Tailwind class names.
frontend/src/lib/videoFileMetadata.ts: Provides a utility that extracts basic video metadata like duration, resolution, and mime type with a timeout fallback.
frontend/src/lib/videoStreamSource.ts: Implements a chunk-based video streaming source that fetches, validates, and assembles video chunks into a blob URL.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/ChannelPage.tsx: Displays a user's channel page with profile data, editable settings, social links, and mock video listings.
frontend/src/pages/FollowingPage.tsx: Shows videos from followed channels or prompts login, currently using mock video data.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with a list of mock featured videos.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Displays the user's uploaded, liked, and saved videos, integrating real queries for metadata and saved lists.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides a multi-section settings interface for general, playback, privacy, and notification preferences.
frontend/src/pages/ShortsPage.tsx: Displays shorts with mood-based recommendations, scroll tracking, and video playback management.
frontend/src/pages/UploadPage.tsx: Handles full-length video uploads with metadata extraction, chunked upload flow, and navigation after success.
frontend/src/pages/UploadShortPage.tsx: Allows uploading short videos under 60 seconds, validating duration and registering the short after blob upload.
frontend/src/pages/WatchPage.tsx: Shows a video watch page with metadata, interactions, mood tracking, share options, and offline detection.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers and manages the service worker with update handling and utilities for unregistering and checking PWA state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, border radii, and theme colors with CSS variable–driven values and animation/typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata defining features, new requests, architectural notes, and versioning for a theme-specific notifications dropdown update.
